question: 飼い主
sourceMnemonic: You know that to <ja>飼う</ja> is "to keep a pet." If you're the <kanji>master</kanji> that is <kanji>keeping a pet</kanji> (<ja>飼う</ja>), then you are the <vocabulary>pet owner</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings for both. You'll need to remember the words <ja>飼う</ja> and <ja>主</ja> to be able to remember the reading of this word.
